Identification.LongTitle: Minister of Communications Authority to Prescribe Fees Order

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Communications and the Treasury Board, pursuant to paragraph 19(1)(b)* of the Financial Administration Act, is pleased hereby to authorize the Minister of Communications to prescribe, by order, the fees or charges to be paid by a user for whom the Department of Communications provides any of the following services :

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: the technical assessment, reassessment, testing or certification of telecommunications apparatus; and

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: the labelling or marking of telecommunications apparatus as evidence of ongoing compliance with the technical requirements, specifications, standards or procedures of the Department of Communications.
